original_text: The men of Dedan traded with you. Many coastlands were your own special markets; they brought you in payment ivory tusks and ebony.
korean_text: 드단 사람은 네 상인이 되었음이여 여러 섬이 너와 거래하여 상아와 박달나무를 네 물품과 바꾸어 갔도다

sentences.original_text: The men of Dedan traded with you.
Many coastlands were your own special markets
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 해안 지역이 너의 특별한 시장이었다.

sentences.original_text: they brought you in payment ivory tusks and ebony.
